channel.title: [CW_Contest] Rework Suggestion
channel.description:
Class Card Name : Court Wizard Class Card Faction : Blue Dragon Class Card Type : Support
**Abilities suggestion N°1 - [The White] Court Wizard:**
1. **Heavy Mana Shield (night ability)**
> Your target will be night immune to every attacks. (2 uses)
2. **Redirect Conversion**
> Your target will be protected from any conversion attempts. If your target gets converted, it will redirect the mastermind or cult leader to the another player you picked. (infinite use)
**Abilities suggestion N°2 - [The psychic] Court Wizard**
1. **Burden (day ability)**
> Select a player. If this player dies tonight, you will share the same burden making both of you bleed dying in 2 nights if not cured.
2. **Turn back (night ability)**
> Turn back is a simple ability that allow you to roll-back in to the pass to revive people who are attacked. If your target is attacked and should normally die. It will roll-back him into time and make live. (1 unique use)
3. **Psychic illusion**
> If your target is not blue dragon faction member. He will be notify that a court wizard confused him. > The target will be confuse the next night and will not be able to choose what he do that night. It will randomly pick for him an ability and a target. If your target is blue dragon faction member. It will block the conversion. (infinite uses)
**Abilities suggestion N°3 - [The Great] Court Wizard**
1. **Reverse (night ability)**
> Reverse the ability from the visitor of the target. It means the player who visit the selected target will do his own ability on himself. > Example: 8(assassin) kill 12(drunk). You cast Reverse on 12. The assassin will kill himself. > Example²: 8(drunk) deb 9(butler). You cast Reverse on 9. The drunk deb himself. > (3 uses)
2. **Mana armor (night ability)**
> Protect yourself or a player from wolves and conversion. (infinite uses)
3. **Disappear (Day ability)**
> You can cast this spell on someone else (3 uses). It will make the target hid for the night. (same as the fool)

item.title: [CW_Contest] Rework Suggestion
item.dc:creator: RawkHawk
item.description:
The frozen literally just sounds awful. All the abilities are basically negative BD since the main attraction is stopping players from talking during the day. I can see many miss lynched for this ability.

Just going over the psychic, all of the abilities are long and confusing and extremely niche. None of them sound fun and the second night ability just sounds like it will run bd.

The great overall just sounds over powered. Reverse is okay. I think it is far too overpower to be an infinite ability. Throw that on prince and he’s basically immortal. At least don’t let it redirect immune players like butler and drunk. They other two abilities are just insanely strong and assure that you and another bd are safe for at least 3 night.

Read full topic

item.description:

Can cast a soft freeze on a player making them unable to use their abilities for tonight. This doesn’t use charge for the target and have infinite use. It can also be casted during the day (disable the day abilities of the target player)-(2 charges)

So is this 2 charges for both day and night combined? Also this is an occupation ability so offensive when court wizard is supposed to be support.

Aurelien_Belot:

The blizzard can be casted on a target preventing players that visit them. 3 charges.

Basically wall of fire but for the Court Wizard.

The problem is I don’t see this court wizard’s MAIN ability that has unlimited uses. I feel that after 5 nights of using these abilities. The court wizard will feel boring. Solution: Make the stop abilities a day ability to stop day abilites or take that out and add in another night ability that has infinite uses.

This has been changed
